articles.description: Filipino teen standout Daniel Quizon downs Thai Prin Laohawirapap to claim an early share of the lead in the Asian Zonal Chess Championships

articles.author: IANS
articles.title: Covid: Hospitalisation, death risk higher among South Asians in UK - Sify News
articles.description: London, May 2 (IANS) People of South Asian origin, living in the UK, are at higher risk for testing positive with Covid-19 and also at increased risks of hospitalisation, ICU admission, and death, according to an observational study published in The Lancet.
